Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it provides, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This exclusive opportunity is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
